price: Banahimbira Allah (ko yabyaye) abakobwa. Ubutagatifu ni ubwe, nta ho ahuriye n’ibyo bamwitirira! Nyamara bo bihitiramo ibyo bifuza (kubyara abahungu).
arabic: وَيَجۡعَلُونَ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡبَنَٰتِ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَلَهُم مَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayajʿalūna lillahi al-banāti sub'ḥānahu walahum mā yashtahūna
